hymn.title: Lord, hast Thou not one word for me
hymn.category: Study of the Word—Seeking for the Word

layout.singingstanza: Lord, hast Thou not one word for me To bind my soul more close to Thee, That ev -- ery e -- vil I may flee; One word, O Lord! one word from Thee?

lyrics.stanza: Lord, hast Thou not one word for me To bind my soul more close to Thee, That every evil I may flee; One word, O Lord! one word from Thee?
One word, to show how weak am I When in my strength alone I try, In vain I toil, in vain I sigh; One word, O Lord! one word from Thee.
One word of power, oh, let me hear, Above the heart's most anxious fear, Thy still, small voice, yet deep and clear; One word, O Lord! one word from Thee.
